name: Chai3d
body:
### Welcome to CHAI3D.
[CHAI3D](http://www.chai3d.org/) is an open source, freely available set of C++ libraries for computer haptics, visualization and interactive real-time simulation.

This repository is based on [CHAI3D for Linux v2.0.0](http://ai.stanford.edu/~conti/download/chai3d-2.0.0-linux-x86_64.tar.gz), I mainly improved make configuration and built a Python binding for CHAI3D.

### Installation

```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/lihuanshuai/chai3d.git
$ cd chai3d
$ git checkout libchai3d
$ make
$ git checkout python-build
$ python setup.py install
```

### TODO

As following:

### Support or Contact
